name: Digital Restoration of Early Renaissance Paintings

description: Design project for an algorithm that can separate restored areas in a painting from its original areas and generate images showing areas where specific pigments were used

name: User Movement Characterization in VR Systems
description: Data collection project for extracting characteristics of users' translational and rotational movements in VR systems

description: A smartphone AR application where a user and a fine-tuned Faster RCNN model collaboratively generate image labels for a training dataset for a deep neural network
